# 30-Day Challenge to Lower Your Blood Pressure with Your iPhone

High blood pressure, also known as hypertension, affects millions of people worldwide. This silent condition often has no symptoms, but it can lead to serious health problems like heart disease and stroke if left untreated. Fortunately, managing your blood pressure doesn't have to be complicated. With the help of your iPhone and this 30-day challenge, you can take control of your health and lower your blood pressure naturally.

## Overview

This 30-day challenge is designed to help you lower your blood pressure using your iPhone. Each week, you'll focus on a different aspect of blood pressure management, including diet, exercise, stress reduction, and sleep. By the end of the 30 days, you'll have developed healthy habits that can help you maintain lower blood pressure for life.

### What You'll Need

- An iPhone with the latest version of iOS
- A blood pressure monitor that connects to your iPhone (optional)
- The MyFitnessPal app (free)
- The Headspace app (free trial available)
- The Sleep Cycle app (free)
